item.title: Chris add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Chris add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Chris add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Chris add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Chris add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Chris add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Chris add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Quote me as saying I was mis-quoted." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Chris add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "A man is only as old as the woman he feels." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Chris add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Whatever it is, I'm against it." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Chris add a quote by George Carlin
Chris add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Those who dance are considered insane by those who cannot hear the music." -- George Carlin

item.title: Chris add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Think of how stupid the average person is, and realize half of them are stupider than that." -- George Carlin

item.title: Chris add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Honesty may be the best policy, but it's important to remember that apparently, by elimination, dishonesty is the second-best policy." -- George Carlin

item.title: Chris add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "The real reason that we can’t have the Ten Commandments in a courthouse: You cannot post “Thou shalt not steal,” “Thou shalt not commit adultery,” and “Thou shalt not lie” in a building full of lawyers, judges, and politicians. It creates a hostile work environment." -- George Carlin

item.title: Chris add a quote by Lawrence Block
item.description: "It's enough of a strain killing people. I've no time for deer. --Mick Ballou" -- Lawrence Block
